scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server.js
scripts.start:uat: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; cross-env NODE_ENV=test node server.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
